msItem.title: קינות לתשעה באב Ḳinot le-Tishʻah be-Av
מספורי החורבן בערבית Me-sipure ha-Ḥurban be-ʿaravit
הפטרה לט"ב בתרגום ערבי Hafṭarah la-Ṭ[isha] b[e-Av] be-targum ʿaravi

collation.p: 13 quires: i(4), ii(8), iii(8-3), iv-xi(8), xii(6), xiii(4). Quire ix, x, and xi also includes unfoliated blank leaves. Lacunae after fols. 4, 64, 70.There is no lacuna between fol. 17 and 18, thus the 3 leaves which were cut off at the end of quire iii, must have been removed during production.

decoDesc.decoNote: Pen drawing of a human figure and a plant? on fol. 61bv.

binding.p: Post-1600, green cloth binding. Spine with M. Gaster's label: 'קינות Maroco & HebrArab Haftara XVII.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: Moses Gaster (b. 1856, d. 1939), scholar and rabbi: his manuscript, Cod. G. 1493: inscribed with his name on fol. 1r; purchased by the British Museum from him on 12 April, 1924; date of accession 23 March 1932: inscribed on back flyleaf (i)r.
